# Your Smart Path to Decarbonization
Enterprise software to measure, analyze, price & reduce carbon emissions in the most cost-effective way

# Climate positive strategy
Abatement first, compensation last. SINAI helps your company reach net zero targets following the Science Based Targets guidelines and principles.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61f7fd9b9433448da991190d_123.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61eadafcb3fa0212feff353d_mobb.png)
# Strategy Starts with Decarbonization Intelligence
While carbon accounting, offsets, removals, and setting targets can all be part of a decarbonization strategy, getting to net zero ultimately means reducing actual emissions.SINAI shows you how.
[Learn More](http://www.sinai.com/</science-based-target>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61c98899f0e447323a82ac63_%D0%A5.svg)
Carbon Accounting
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61c98899f0e447323a82ac63_%D0%A5.svg)
Setting Net Zero Targets
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61c98899f0e447323a82ac63_%D0%A5.svg)
Buying Credits/Offsets
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61c98a030afbca606e133ec0_Check.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/618aebc419672e4c3fae9b87_Frame%20192.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61b3380e9c9c7301620be005_icoon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61f9079953e50c7453929daf_Frame%20195.png)
Identify cost-effective decarbonization strategies
SINAI unlocks emission reduction strategies that allow your organization to achieve science-based targets and execute competitive transition plans.
[Learn More](http://www.sinai.com/</solutions/solution-carbon-strategy>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/63368460f798ee7f88d13c49_Group%2014786.png)
# Decarbonization Solutions
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/618aebc419672e182dae9cf1_Icon1_Sl1%201.png)
Quantify & Report
• Achievable Emissions Targets
• Dynamic Carbon Budgets

• Value Chain Engagement

### What customers say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/618aebc419672e133eae9c4c_Frame%20122.png)
Carlos Almiro de Magalhães Melo
Head of Corporate Sustainability
BRK started using SINAI at an important stage in our climate change strategy. In only two months, we were able to engage several teams on the climate change agenda. SINAI presents carbon pricing in a simple and objective way and this was key to engage the board.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/618aebc419672e54e1ae9cf2_Frame%20122.png)
**Rafael Oliveira Silva**
Corporate EHS Specialist, Siemens Energy
With the SINAI’s software, our process has been deeply improved in the tracking, analysis, and decision making, since our emission inventory and results are available in detail and, accurately right after the data input. We are ready to move forward with the next steps in our neutralization journey.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/618aebc419672e89d4ae9cd1_Right.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/618aebc419672e2ff8ae9cd2_rr.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/618aebc419672e7367ae9ba3_Text.svg)

# Climate positive strategy
Abatement first, compensation last. SINAI helps your company reach net zero targets following the Science Based Targets guidelines and principles.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61f7fd9b9433448da991190d_123.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61eadafcb3fa0212feff353d_mobb.png)
# Strategy Starts with Decarbonization Intelligence
While carbon accounting, offsets, removals, and setting targets can all be part of a decarbonization strategy, getting to net zero ultimately means reducing actual emissions.SINAI shows you how.
Learn More⟨21⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/61c98899f0e447323a82ac63_%D0%A5.svg)

Identify cost-effective decarbonization strategies
SINAI unlocks emission reduction strategies that allow your organization to achieve science-based targets and execute competitive transition plans.

### What customers say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/618aebc419672e133eae9c4c_Frame%20122.png)
Carlos Almiro de Magalhães Melo
Head of Corporate Sustainability
BRK started using SINAI at an important stage in our climate change strategy. In only two months, we were able to engage several teams on the climate change agenda. SINAI presents carbon pricing in a simple and objective way and this was key to engage the board.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/618aebc419672ed549ae9b18/618aebc419672e54e1ae9cf2_Frame%20122.png)
**Rafael Oliveira Silva**
Corporate EHS Specialist, Siemens Energy
With the SINAI’s software, our process has been deeply improved in the tracking, analysis, and decision making, since our emission inventory and results are available in detail and, accurately right after the data input. We are ready to move forward with the next steps in our neutralization journey.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: SINAI Technologies**

**Founded:** 2017  
**Location:** San Francisco, California  
**Team Size:** 50 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W20  
**Website:** [sinai.com](http://www.sinai.com)

**Mission:** SINAI is committed to providing enterprise software that enables carbon-intensive companies to quantify and manage their carbon emissions cost-effectively. Its mission revolves around helping organizations navigate the complexities of carbon measurement, tax management, and emission reduction.

**Core Functionality:**
At its core, SINAI offers a platform that helps companies assess their carbon footprint and adopt strategies to mitigate it. This includes functions like:
- **Carbon Inventories:** Track and report emissions across Scopes 1-3.
- **Baselines:** Forecast future emissions to set realistic targets.
- **Low-Carbon Scenarios:** Identify opportunities for emission reductions.
- **Internal Carbon Pricing:** Establish dynamic pricing models to integrate carbon costs into financial decisions.
- **Value Chain Management:** Collaborate with suppliers and partners to decarbonize products.

**Industry Focus:**  
SINAI's solutions are applicable across various industries, including:
- Transportation
- Industrials & Manufacturing
- Utilities
- Buildings & Construction

**Current Trends:**  
Employing a strategy of "abate first, compensate last," SINAI helps companies establish science-based targets in alignment with the global push towards net-zero emissions. The focus is on tangible reductions rather than relying solely on offsets.

**Notable Partnerships:**  
SINAI has gained traction with significant players across the corporate landscape, as shown by its collaborative efforts with companies such as Bayer, Siemens Energy, and Harley Davidson.

**Customer Feedback:**  
Clients have praised SINAI for simplifying carbon pricing and enhancing operational efficiency. For instance, BRK mentioned that engagement on climate strategies surged within just months of implementing SINAI’s software.

**Summary:**  
In a world increasingly aware of climate change’s impacts, SINAI Technologies stands out as a tool for businesses aiming to proactively address their carbon emissions. By leveraging cutting-edge software solutions, they empower companies to make informed decisions about their environmental strategies, supporting the global shift towards sustainable practices. The future of CO2 management is bright with SINAI leading the charge.
